name: BLADENET
description: BLADENET is a multiplayer game of hide and seek. Blend into the virtual cyberpunk world of BLADENET, find the other players — and assassinate them to collect their data and escape. Remember someone is always watching — Stay anonymous, stay alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz Graphics: nVidia GTX660 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space
